g.text: I'd like to pay Mulenga Kapwepwe
100 ZMW for her latest book, please
I want to send to MSISDN 260795390415
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
Yes, it's Mulenga Kapwepwe. She can receive in ZMW
Please quote for a payment of 100 ZMW.
Please quote for a transfer which sends 100 ZMW.
Hmmm. I'll need to get some currency conversion
What FXPs do you know about?
What FXPs do you know about?
Here are the available FXPs:FDH FX
I'll ask FDH FX to perform my conversion
I propose to charge 2 ZMW for executing this payment,
and this is a RECEIVE amount,
so I need to add it to the currency conversion request
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
Here is the initial version of the transfer.
Please quote me for the currency conversion.
OK, so I need to figure this out...
I will add a 150 MWK fee for undertaking the conversion.
Now I'll set an expiry time, sign the quotation object,
create an ILPV4 prepare packet and return it in the intermediary object.
NOTE: the ILPV4 prepare packet contains the following items, all encoded:
- The amount being sent (i.e. in the source currency)
- The content of the conversion terms
OK, so I will add 2 ZMW on top of the conversion fee.
Now I sign the transaction object
and return it to the Debtor DFSP
OK, I can see that there are going to be 250 MWK in charges.
Hi, Upile: I can do the transfer.
It'll cost you 250 MWK in fees
Let me know if you want to go ahead
Does the debtor hold an account in MWK? Yes.
Make the reservation against the account
FDH_FX has a reservation of 5250 MWK
Do I need to activate currency conversion?
Please confirm your part of the transfer
OK, so this is an FX confirmation.
Does the requesting FSP have an account in the source currency?
Find the transfer on which this conversion depends.
Liquidity check and reserve on debtor account for this transfer
NBS_Bank has a reservation of 5250 MWK
FDH_FX has a reservation of 102 ZMW
Please confirm the currency conversion part of the transfer
If so, send the fulfilment back
Check fulfilment matches and cancel if not.
Sorry, your payment did not succeed.
You have not been charged for this payment.
Conversion succeeded subject to transfer success
Let me check that the terms of the transfer
are the same as the ones I agreed to
Yes, they do. I approve the transfer
Transfer is confirmed, here's the fulfilment
Is this dependency against the debtor party to the transfer?
the party named in the dependency (the FXP)
Is the transfer denominated in the currency of the amount?
the party named in the dependency (the FXP)
You can clear it in your ledgers
Let's just check: does this match the stuff I sent?
It does. Great. I'll clear the conversion
NBS_Bank has a debit of 5250 MWK
FDH_FX has a credit of 5250 MWK
FDH_FX has a debit of 102 ZMW
Zoona has a credit of 102 ZMW
Commit the funds in my ledgers
